sources.dataset_title: National Highways project-wise progress and execution data
sources.license_terms: Open Government Data License - India (OGL), subject to data.gov.in terms
sources.reliability_justification: Official source published on India OGD platform with API metadata and versioned resource identifiers.
sources.known_limitations: May include delayed updates for corridor-level project reporting when agencies file late updates.
sources.notes: Set DATAGOVIN_NHAI_RESOURCE_ID and DATAGOVIN_API_KEY in environment before auto-fetch.

sources.dataset_title: National Highways project finance and budget allocation data
sources.license_terms: Open Government Data License - India (OGL), subject to data.gov.in terms
sources.reliability_justification: Official finance-focused reporting aligned to National Highway project execution and budget flow.
sources.known_limitations: Budget and release fields can be revised by corrigenda and ministry clarifications.
sources.notes: Use approved API key and official resource id; local/manual CSV fallback is supported for non-production runs.

sources.publisher_org: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH)
sources.dataset_title: MoRTH annual report PDF tables (selected annexes)
sources.license_terms: Open publication on morth.gov.in; verify page-level reuse permissions in the PDF footer or Gazette notice
sources.reliability_justification: Official statutory reporting, but data must be parsed from PDF tables with occasional extraction noise.
sources.known_limitations: Table extraction from scanned or merged PDFs may miss footnotes and row merges.
sources.notes: Use manual approval and local archival copy path under data/raw/manual for reproducibility.

sources.dataset_title: NHAI publications and press release index
sources.license_terms: Official publication metadata reuse as per NHAI terms of use.
sources.reliability_justification: Official newsroom metadata source, useful for provenance tracking and release timeline only.
sources.known_limitations: Only metadata/announce-level data; project performance metrics still need source documents.
sources.permanent_identifier_hint: press-release page slug and publication date
sources.notes: Metadata-only connector; does not scrape full article bodies.

sources.dataset_title: Road accident state and year summary tables
sources.license_terms: NCRB publication terms. Use only published tables and cite report/table numbers.
sources.reliability_justification: Official yearly accident reporting used by Parliament/Q&A and policy briefs.
sources.known_limitations: Some states publish corrections after annual report release windows.
sources.permanent_identifier_hint: year and report table page numbers
sources.notes: Set download paths manually in data/raw/manual and run through parser with explicit approval.

sources.publisher_org: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation / Parliament Secretariat
sources.dataset_title: Parliamentary Questions and written replies on highways
sources.license_terms: Official parliament documentation; cite Q&A number and session/session year in methodology.
sources.reliability_justification: Official accountability records are authoritative; source is manually curated from committee and QA archives with approvals.
sources.known_limitations: Coverage is sparse for pre-2019 records and depends on state-wise question indexing quality.
sources.notes: Keep this as an official curated artifact under data/raw/manual with human approval.

sources.publisher_org: Reserve Bank of India / Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation
sources.dataset_title: Macro indicators relevant to highway finance and inflation adjustments
sources.license_terms: Official statistical products; confirm redistribution terms in portal.
sources.reliability_justification: Official macro indicators from central institutions; stable methodology and publication process.
sources.known_limitations: Coverage definitions can be revised between circulars and revisions may arrive post-release.
sources.notes: Endpoint examples vary by product page; leave disabled until an open, documented endpoint is provided.

sources.publisher_org: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH)
sources.dataset_title: Procurement and award notices for highway works
sources.license_terms: EProcurement portal terms and bidder-facing reuse restrictions.
sources.reliability_justification: Portal controls prevent reproducible crawling; value comes only from official release pages and parliamentary disclosures.
sources.known_limitations: Authenticated/robotically-restricted portal and captcha protections prevent programmatic access.
sources.permanent_identifier_hint: notice number and award order id
sources.notes: Documented as a gap: manual retrieval only due captcha/restricted access.

sources.publisher_org: National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) / Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH)
sources.dataset_title: Contractor qualification, performance, and award disclosures
sources.license_terms: Use official releases and disclosures only; verify reuse permissions in associated notices.
sources.reliability_justification: Official contract disclosures exist but often arrive as notices that require curated ingestion.
sources.known_limitations: Incomplete publication trails and inconsistent notice formatting across cycles.
sources.permanent_identifier_hint: notice/award order id and publication date
sources.notes: Curation gate is manual due format and publication variability.

sources.publisher_org: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH)
sources.dataset_title: Arbitration and claim settlements associated with highway projects
sources.license_terms: Use only official releases, tribunal disclosures, and ministry-level replies.
sources.reliability_justification: Official legal updates are authoritative but are typically scattered across ministry archives and notices.
sources.known_limitations: Claims records are not published under a single public API.
sources.notes: Keep this source behind manual approval until official index references are standardized.

sources.publisher_org: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways (MoRTH)
sources.dataset_title: Toll and FASTag collection quality signal snapshots
sources.license_terms: Portal specific API terms. Verify if telemetry fields are aggregated only.
sources.reliability_justification: Source area is important, but API and portal behavior are controlled and intermittent; treat signals as provisional.
sources.known_limitations: Public API surface changes intermittently; historical re-run windows may have gaps.
sources.permanent_identifier_hint: API endpoint version and response schema
sources.notes: Not currently implemented due access uncertainty.

sources.dataset_title: Corridor geometry and ancillary maintenance proxy indicators
sources.license_terms: OpenStreetMap ODbL terms; geometry/proxy use with attribution and separation from official metrics.
sources.known_limitations: Proxy only. Not an official measurement of highway condition.
sources.reliability_justification: Open mapping dataset useful for route geometry context; explicitly separated from official metrics.
sources.permanent_identifier_hint: Overpass query id or source timestamp
sources.notes: Use as geometry context only and mark as proxy-derived in UI.

sources.dataset_title: VIIRS nightlights proxy activity index around national highways
sources.license_terms: Use NASA VIIRS proxy dataset under official redistribution terms; separate from measured infrastructure condition metrics.
sources.reliability_justification: Globally recognized satellite proxy; useful for correlation but not an official road condition measurement.
sources.known_limitations: Not a direct condition survey; requires careful interpretation and clear uncertainty disclosure.
sources.permanent_identifier_hint: official nightlight scene id or annual product release
sources.notes: Use only officially mirrored/stable snapshots; add through data/raw/manual for reproducibility.
